org.csstudio.platform.simpledal
Interface IConnector

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConnector, DalConnector, LocalConnector
public interface IConnector

Represents a connector for a process variable.

Author:
Sven Wende

Method Summary
 void forceDispose()
          Disposes this connector regardless of its internal state.
 ConnectionState getLatestConnectionState()
          Returns the latest (cached) connection state.
 String getLatestError()
          Returns the latest (cached) error.
 Object getLatestValue()
          Returns the latest (cached) value.
 int getListenerCount()
          Returns the number of listeners that are currently attached to this connector.
 IProcessVariableAddress getProcessVariableAddress()
          Returns the process variable address.
 ValueType getValueType()
          Returns the value type.
 void init()
          Initializes the connector.
 boolean isDisposable()
          Returns true, if the connector is disposable.

forceDispose

void forceDispose()
Disposes this connector regardless of its internal state. This could not be undone and must be called very carefully.
